title: How to get information from a picture - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are looking for technical information about the photograph or the creator’s information if you open the photo in Photoshop and under the drop down menu “FILE” go to “file info” you will find a lot of embedded information. This is usually exif information, or metadata. You may be able to find some information regarding the photo using other programs. Allan

Using the MATLAB command/function imageinfo you can get the complete attributes of the image, for the more information of the function follow the link Image Information tool - MATLAB imageinfo - MathWorks India .
